info.title: ALVAO
info.description: Alvao enables you automate actions in Alvao Service Desk and Asset Management and integrate with other applications.

contentHtml.description: Content of the record in Html.

contentPlain.description: Content of the record in plain text.

emailTo.description: Recipients of the message separated by a semicolon.

emailCc.description: Recipients of the message separated by a semicolon.

created.description: Date and time in which should be the record created. Leave empty for current.

showToRequester.description: Decide whether the requester should see the record.

contentPlain.description: Log record content in plain text.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Include linked resources with retrieved resources with OData v4.0 $expand

patch.description: Updates ticket columns. Set only properties to change. To change SLA set either slaId or slaName. To change requester set either Requester ID only or all data in requester (unregistered user).

put.summary: Assign ticket to solver or solver team
put.description: Assigns ticket to solver or solver team.

messageForSolverHtml.description: Message for solver and/or for solver team in HTML.

put.description: Changes ticket state. It can be used also for resolving or reopening the ticket. Either State ID or State Name is required.
Moves ticket to another service. Either Service ID or Service Name is required.

get.description: Returns objects with its properties according to OData parameters.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: To include object properties in response

post.description: Creates a new object from specified template under specified object.

templateObjectId.description: Select the object template or enter its ID (tblNode.intNodeId).
templateObjectId.title: Template

parentObjectId.description: Select the parent object or enter its ID (tblNode.intNodeId).
parentObjectId.title: Parent Object

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: To include object properties in response.

patch.description: Moves an object to a specified destination.

parentObjectId.description: Select the destination object or enter its ID (tblNode.intNodeId).
parentObjectId.title: Destination Object

name.description: Select the property of the object.
name.title: Name

value.description: Specify the value of the property.

post.description: Imports objects provided in CSV format. Similar functionality to ImportUtil utility.

post.summary: When a ticket transitions to a status
post.description: This operation is triggered when a ticket transitions to a certain status.

process.description: Enter the name of the process for which you want to trigger this flow.
process.title: Process

status.description: Enter the name of the ticket status. Ticket transition to this status will trigger this flow.
status.title: Ticket status

service.description: Enter the name of the service for which you want to trigger this flow.
service.title: Service

delete.description: This action will stop the trigger that you previously registered.

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: ID of the webhook to delete.

204.description: Response to successfully deleting a webhook

post.summary: When a ticket field value is changed
post.description: This operation is triggered when a certain ticket field value is changed.

process.description: Enter the name of the process for which you want to trigger this flow.
process.title: Process

service.description: Enter the name of the service for which you want to trigger this flow.
service.title: Service

post.description: This operation is triggered when an object of a certain kind is created.

kindId.description: Select the kind of the object for which you want to trigger this flow.
kindId.title: Kind

parentObjectId.description: Select the parent object for whose subtree you want to trigger this flow.
parentObjectId.title: Parent Object

post.description: This operation is triggered when an object of a certain kind is moved to a different position in the object tree.

kindId.description: Select the kind of the object for which you want to trigger this flow.
kindId.title: Kind

fromObjectId.description: Select the source object for whose subtree you want to trigger this flow.
fromObjectId.title: Moved From

toObjectId.description: Select the destination object for whose subtree you want to trigger this flow.
toObjectId.title: Moved To

post.summary: When a value of an object property is changed
post.description: This operation is triggered when a value of a certain object property is changed.

propertyKindId.description: Select the property of the object for which you want to trigger this flow.
propertyKindId.title: Property

newValue.description: Enter the new value of the property for which you want to trigger this flow. E.g. PC123, 1.45, 14. 4. 2024.
newValue.title: New Value

kindId.description: Select the kind of the object for which you want to trigger this flow.
kindId.title: Object Kind

parentObjectId.description: Select the parent object for whose subtree you want to trigger this flow.
parentObjectId.title: Parent Object

get.description: Returns users and their properties according to OData parameters.

inApproval.description: Whether the ticket is in approval process.

personId.description: ID of the person who made the change (tPerson.iPersonId).

fullName.description: Object name with path in the tree.
Object name with path in the tree.

dateTimeFormat.description: Datetime format in text strings (e.g. dd/MM/yyyy).

separator.description: The column separator used in the imported CSV.

skipErrors.description: If enabled, data is imported even if there is an error in one of the entries.

keyFields.description: Key fields used to identify and update existing objects (e.g. Serial number, Model).

createUnderObjectId.description: Parent object for creating new objects.
createUnderObjectId.title: Parent Object

updateDiscardedObjects.description: If enabled, discarded objects are also searched for and updated on import.

recordsTotalCount.description: Total count of records in CSV.

sAMAccountName.description: User username that supports previous version of Windows.

isSystem.description: Whether user is the Alvao System.

isHidden.description: Whether user is hidden in menus.

isShared.description: Whether user is a shared account.

isDisabled.description: Whether user is a disabled account.

isGuest.description: Whether user is the Guest user.

isApp.description: Whether user is an application account.

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.description: Specify the ID of the ticket (tHdTicket.iHdTicketId).

objectId.name: objectId
objectId.description: Select the object or enter its ID (tblNode.intNodeId).

odata.top.name: $top
odata.top.description: Specify the number of objects you want to return.

odata.search.name: $search
odata.search.description: Specify the fulltext search condition. OData $search.

odata.filter.name: $filter
odata.filter.description: Specify the filter, e.g. Name eq Milk. OData $filter.

odata.filter.user.name: $filter
odata.filter.user.description: Specify the filter, e.g. Email eq james.smith@contoso.com. OData $filter.

ServerError.description: Error on the REST API endpoint.
